product_name: Anua – Centella Red Spot Cream, 30ml
ingredients: Anua – Centella Red Spot Cream – 30 ml – a soothing and restorative cream formulated to calm irritation, reduce redness, and support skin recovery. Enriched with Centella Asiatica Extract and Calamine , it targets sensitive and troubled areas, helping to balance sebum, soothe inflammation, and strengthen the skin barrier. Its lightweight, non-greasy texture absorbs quickly, leaving the skin refreshed, hydrated, and clear — ideal for acne-prone or irritated skin. Product contains: Centella Asiatica Extract – promotes healing, reduces inflammation, and strengthens the skin barrier. Calamine – soothes redness, relieves irritation, and provides a gentle cooling effect. Tea Tree Leaf Extract – purifies the skin, helping to prevent breakouts and reduce blemishes. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) – brightens the skin, refines pores, and improves overall texture. Panthenol (Vitamin B5) – hydrates and soothes the skin while supporting regeneration. Allantoin – softens and protects, enhancing comfort and smoothness. Product effects: calms redness and irritation, helps reduce acne and blemish spots, promotes faster skin recovery, controls excess sebum and minimizes pores, leaves skin balanced, hydrated, and clear. Our cosmetologist recommends this product in case of: acne-prone, sensitive, or irritated skin, visible redness or inflammation, post-acne marks or uneven skin texture, need for gentle yet effective spot care. How to use: Apply an appropriate amount to affected or irritated areas after cleansing and toning. Gently pat until absorbed. Can be used daily, morning and evening. Capacity: 30 ml Expiration date: see packaging. Country of origin: South Korea.

product_name: Anua – Heartleaf Succinic Moisture Cleansing Foam, 150ml
ingredients: Anua – Heartleaf Succinic Moisture Cleansing Foam – 150 ml – a gentle, purifying cleanser that removes impurities and excess sebum while maintaining the skin’s natural moisture balance. Infused with Heartleaf (Houttuynia Cordata) Extract and Succinic Acid , it helps to calm irritation, prevent breakouts, and purify pores without stripping the skin. The rich, creamy foam leaves the skin clean, refreshed, and hydrated — ideal for sensitive, combination, or acne-prone skin types. Product contains: Heartleaf (Houttuynia Cordata) Extract – soothes inflammation, calms redness, and provides antibacterial benefits to protect sensitive or acne-prone skin. Succinic Acid – gently exfoliates, clears pores, and regulates sebum production for smoother, clearer skin. Panthenol (Vitamin B5) – hydrates and strengthens the skin barrier, maintaining softness and comfort. Centella Asiatica Extract – promotes healing, reduces irritation, and enhances overall skin resilience. Glycerin – attracts and retains moisture, preventing tightness after cleansing. Allantoin – softens, soothes, and protects the skin. Product effects: gently removes dirt, oil, and makeup residue, purifies and refines pores without over-drying, soothes irritation and helps prevent acne, balances sebum and moisture levels, leaves skin fresh, soft, and hydrated. Our cosmetologist recommends this product in case of: oily, combination, or acne-prone skin, redness, sensitivity, or irritation, dull, congested complexion, need for gentle daily cleansing without tightness. How to use: Dispense a small amount and lather with water to create foam. Massage gently onto damp skin in circular motions. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water and pat dry. Capacity: 150 ml Expiration date: see packaging. Country of origin: South Korea.

product_name: Abib – Sedum Hyaluron Pad Hydrating Touch, 75pads
ingredients: Abib – Sedum Hyaluron Pad Hydrating Touch – 75 pads – deeply hydrating toner pads infused with sedum extract and hyaluronic acid to replenish moisture, soothe dryness, and smooth the skin. product_name: Abib – Pore Cleansing Oil Heartleaf Oil-Wash, 200ml
ingredients: Abib – Pore Cleansing Oil (Heartleaf Oil-Wash) – 200 ml – a lightweight cleansing oil formulated with heartleaf extract to dissolve makeup, sunscreen, and excess sebum while calming sensitive or acne-prone skin. Its smooth, non-greasy texture emulsifies easily into a milky rinse, helping unclog pores and leave the skin clean, soft, and comfortably balanced. Product contains: Heartleaf (Houttuynia Cordata) Extract – soothes irritation, reduces redness, and supports clearer-looking skin. product_name: A’pieu – Raspberry Hair Vinegar, 200ml
ingredients: A’PIEU – Raspberry Hair Vinegar – a refreshing hair care treatment formulated with raspberry extract and vinegar to purify the scalp, balance its pH, and smooth the hair cuticles for a radiant, silky finish. Apple Fruit Extract – smooths and softens the hair cuticles, improving texture and adding luminosity. Lactic Acid – gently exfoliates dead skin cells from the scalp and promotes a clean, balanced environment for healthy hair growth. product_name: Anua – Ultra-Thin Spot Cover Patch, 75ea
ingredients: ANUA – Ultra-Thin Spot Cover Patch – 75 pcs – ultra-thin hydrocolloid patches designed to discreetly cover and heal blemishes while providing barrier support and calming care. Product contains: Hydrocolloid film (0.25 mm) – absorbs fluids and sebum from spots, supports faster healing and prevents picking. Ceramide NP – strengthens the skin barrier and helps prevent irritation around blemish zones. Centella Asiatica Extract & Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract – soothe redness, calm inflammation and support recovery. Product effects: reduces visible whiteheads, blemish size and redness, protects the affected area from external bacteria and picking, blends naturally into skin with a matte, low-profile finish, supports barrier recovery and leaves skin calmer and better supported. Recommended for: active pimples or raised blemishes that need protection, skin prone to irritation, picking or slow-healing spots, breakout-prone skin needing a discreet hide-and-repair solution under makeup or overnight. How to use: After cleansing and drying the skin, select a patch slightly larger than the blemish. Peel off and apply directly onto the spot, pressing gently for full adhesion. Leave on for up to 8 hours or until the patch turns white with absorbed residue, then remove. Use as needed. Capacity: 75 patches Expiration date: see packaging. Country of origin: South Korea.
